name: Quaternion (itch)
description:
A game about moving through a world where gravity is constantly changing and the world spins around you.

Made in 48 hours for the GMTK Game Jam

Game by Jorge Antonio Velasquez Belmonte

Music by LinkFrost (https://soundcloud.com/link-frost)

Creators of Assets Used:

Kenney (www.kenny.nl)

Alfred Reinold Baudisch (https://twitter.com/SplitPainter)

PLEBES

thatguynm

Overaction Game Studio (http://overactiongamestudio.com/)
